targets.query: select last(fw_release) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter
select last(controller_uptime_seconds) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select last(health_string) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select last(system_disk_state_string) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select last(dirty_cache_percent) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select last(icc_state_string) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select sum(enclosure_fault) from sfa_enc_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m GROUP BY enclosure_type
select last(drives_healthy), last(drives_failed), last(drives_failure_predicted), last(drives_locked) from sfa_drive_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter
select sum(is_running) from sfa_vm_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select sum(fault_status) from sfa_vm_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select last(temp_celsius) from sfa_temp_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m  and location =~ /.*Ambient.*/
select sum(health_failure) from sfa_temp_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select mean(esm_a_temps) from (select last(temp_celsius) as esm_a_temps from sfa_temp_health where location =~ /ESM_A_Exp.*/ group by location,enclosure_position)
select mean(esm_b_temps) from (select last(temp_celsius) as esm_b_temps from sfa_temp_health where location =~ /ESM_B_Exp.*/ group by location,enclosure_position)
select count(is_present) from sfa_fan_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select sum(fan_fault_true) from sfa_fan_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select last(battery_days_left) from sfa_ups_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by enclosure_index
select count(is_present) from sfa_expander_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select sum(expander_fault) from sfa_expander_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select (underw+overw) from (select sum(under_volt_warn) as underw,sum(over_volt_warn) as overw from sfa_voltage_sensor_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m)
select (underf+overf) from (select sum(under_volt_fail) as underf,sum(over_volt_fail) as overf from sfa_voltage_sensor_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m)
select count(is_present) from sfa_psu_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m  and location =~ /^PSU.*/
select sum(ac_failure) from sfa_psu_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m  and location =~ /^PSU.*/
select sum(psu_fault_true) from sfa_psu_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter and location =~ /^PSU.*/
select last(health_state_string) from sfa_ups_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by enclosure_index
select count(is_present) from sfa_sep_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select sum(is_failed) from sfa_sep_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and time > now() - 5m
select pool,health_string,member_count_health,member_count from sfa_pool_health where time > now() - 5m and unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/
select vd,auto_write_locked_string,verify_status_string,bad_blocks,dirty_cache_kib,home_con_rp_name,pref_home_con_rp_name from sfa_vd_health where time > now() - 5m and unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/
select (dirty_cache_kib) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select (dirty_cache_percent) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select (dirty_cache_kib) from sfa_vd_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by vd
select (dirty_cache_percent) from sfa_controller_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by controller_index
select (temp_celsius) from sfa_temp_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by location
select (fan_speed_rpm) from sfa_fan_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by location
select drives_failed as "Failed Drives", drives_failure_predicted as "Predicted Fail Drives", drives_locked as "Locked Drives" from sfa_drive_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter
select sum(ac_failure) as "PSU AC Failure" from sfa_psu_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter  and location =~ /^PSU.*/ group by time(5m)
select sum(psu_fault_true) as "PSU Fault" from sfa_psu_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter  and location =~ /^PSU.*/ group by time(5m)
select sum(fan_fault_true) as "Fans Faulted" from sfa_fan_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter  group by time(5m)
select sum(fault_status) as "StacksFaulted" from sfa_vm_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter  group by time(5m)
select expander_fault as "Faulted Expanders" from sfa_expander_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter
select sum(is_failed) as "Seps Faulted" from sfa_sep_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter  group by time(5m)
select bad_blocks from sfa_vd_health where $timeFilter and unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ group by vd
select verify_status_code as "Verifies Enabled" from sfa_vd_health where unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ and $timeFilter group by vd
select ABS(1-health_status) from sfa_pool_health where $timeFilter and unit =~  /^$sfa_unit$/ group by pool

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM sfa_controller_health WITH KEY = "unit"
list.label: SFA Appliance
list.name: sfa_unit

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM sfa_controller_health WITH KEY = "unit"
